uk.ac.liv.util
Class DisplayOutput

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.util.DisplayOutput

public class DisplayOutput
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages three display buffers. Last frame I/P Current frame I/P/B Next P frame P

Constructor Summary
DisplayOutput(int mbWidth, int mbHeight)
          Construct Display (width/height in macroblocks) Internally a frame of width 1 macroblock is placed around the the display region
